name: Network-Verification-Bot
description: A bot to verify users in your network .

TOKEN.description: Your bot token. Can be obtained from https://telegram.dog/BotFather/

API_ID.description: Get API_ID from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based modules.

API_HASH.description: Get API_HASH from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based modules.

TOS_LINK.description: your network's terms and conditions link

VERIFICATION_CHANNEL_ID.description: your verification channel integer id where bot will send filled forms

VERIFICATION_CHANNEL_USERNAME.description: your verification channel username without @ where bot will send filled forms

ADMINS.description: list of Auth user Id who can access bot without password and have rights to use admin commands

NETWORK_IMG.description: give the telegraph link of your network logo.

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables. Leave it as it is
